channel.title: How to make admin on RSCA
channel.description:
Okay it worked one time then stopped working all in all... I changed the Group_ID in Groups database to 8 so I could get admin on forum... but ever since I changed that it doesnt work.. I changed it back to 1 and it still doesnt work... Im just wondering how you make yourself admin.. in Rsca2_players there is Group_ID and even playermod.. SO I DONT KNOW what to do.. so please reply and help! ty
-Big ballers

item.title: How to make admin on RSCA
item.dc:creator: @imsocruel imsocruel
item.description:
@imsocruel wrote:

ok if you need any help pm me for my msn

Read full topic

item.title: How to make admin on RSCA
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

I just backed up the database and wiped it and restored but did not restore the GROUPS and it worked…

Read full topic

item.title: How to make admin on RSCA
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

in-game = rsca2_players

update rsca2_players set group_id=“1” where username=“myleetcharacter”;

Read full topic
